plantTreeText: We plant your tree locally in one of our projects in Germany and take care of it after.
headerSubtext1: We plant trees for the climate.
selectAndPlantNow: Select and plant trees now. The following trees are available:
selectTreeText: Choose which trees you want to plant. You can see directly how much CO<sub>2</sub> is bound.
plantbagText: Once you have filled your plantbag, go to checkout. It is important that you are logged in.
certificateText: After confirming your donation, you can create a certificate.
offerAreaText: We need your help! In order to plant more trees, we are looking for new reforestation areas. Offer your area to us.
rankingPageText: Only together can we achieve CO<sub>2</sub> neutrality. Here is a list of all participants who have planted with I Plant a Tree.
projectsSectionInfo: All trees are planted in Germany.
projectsDescription: Our projects are distributed throughout Germany. Currently, we plant the most in Saxony-Anhalt.
name: Name
newsLetterText: Stay up to date. With our newsletter, you'll be the first to know when new projects go online. You can cancel the subscription at any time.
noTeamYet: has not joined any team yet.
createSelfplantDescription1: You can also create your own planting here,
createSelfplantDescription2: so it appears in your profile.
createSelfplantDescription3: Create your planting here. When you have filled in all fields, the planting will appear in your profile.
proposalOrIndividualText: How many trees do you want to plant? We will create a suitable plant bag for you.
title: Title
plsLoginToContinue: Please log in to create your own planting!
offerAreaIntro: We transform land into charitable forest. To do this, we are looking for areas that:
offerAreaList2: we can obtain reforestation approval for (no dry meadows or orchards),
offerAreaList3: are at least three hectares in size and ideally located along a road or path,
offerAreaList4: preferably cost a maximum of 6,000 euros/ha.
offerAreaDescription: With us, the land is in good charitable hands. We also appreciate existing forests to protect them in the long term. If we ever cease to exist, the values of I Plant A Tree will be transferred according to the statutes to another charitable environmental organization. If you, someone in your family, or your circle of friends wants to sell, give away, or bequeath a plot, please contact us.
offerAreaFormHeader: Please enter the necessary data in the form. We will then contact you.
welcomeActivation: Welcome! Please log in to continue.
termsLink: Go to the Terms and Conditions!
privacyPolicy: I have read and accept the privacy policy.
terms: I have read and accept the terms and conditions.
plsActivateAccount: Welcome to I Plant a Tree! To complete the registration, please click on the link in the email we just sent you.
BANK_UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred in transferring to the donation bank (parameter).
BANK_INVALID_ACCOUNT: Invalid account number according to the verification process.
BANK_NO_FIRSTNAME: First name is a required field.
BANK_NO_NAME: Last name is a required field.
BANK_NO_ZIP: ZIP code is a required field.
BANK_CONNECTION_ERROR: Error connecting to the donation bank.
BANK_UNDEFINED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred in transferring to the donation bank.
BANK_ACCOUNT_NR_TOO_LONG: Account number too long or too short (508).
BANK_ACCOUNT_NR_TOO_SHORT: Account number too long or too short (509).
CART_IS_NULL: The shopping cart does not exist.
noTreesToPlant: Unfortunately, we currently do not have any areas available for reforestation.
pleaseEnterGiftCode: Please enter your 16-digit gift code here:
CODE_ALREADY_REDEEMED: Gift code has already been redeemed
treesInvalid: The trees are no longer available.
giftRedeemInfoHeader: You are not logged in! Only registered users can redeem gifts.
giftRedeemInfoDescription1: Only as a registered user will you automatically receive a donation receipt, your own profile, and can create certificates and gift vouchers.
plantBagInfoText: Only as a registered user will you automatically receive a donation receipt, your own profile, and can create certificates and gift vouchers.
selectPlantBagsForCertificate: Please select the plant bags to appear on the certificate
thisTextIsShownInYourCertificate: This text will be displayed in your certificate
certificateDefaultText: For our children to have a beautiful future.
contactForProof: For more than 10, please contact us as we require proof.
emailChangedWarning: After changing the email, you must log in again!
usernameChangedWarning: After changing the username, you must log in again!
customPlantingInfo: Here, you decide which trees you want to plant where.
exploreTip: Click on the green dots to learn more about the tree.
markOnMapPls: Please mark the planting on the map!
customPlantingInfoSingleProject: Here, you decide which trees you want to plant.
howManyTreesDidYouPlant: How many trees did you plant?
notGreaterThan1MB: The image must not be larger than 1 MB.
widgetInfo: You can integrate the following widgets into your website. Simply copy one of the codes and paste it in the desired location.
